items.sentence: Tom seems to like the same kind of music as Mary.
Tom seldom makes mistakes when writing in French.
The size of the carpet is 120 by 160 centimeters.
Tom and Mary eat steak two or three times a week.
Tom and Mary have been married for over 30 years.
Tom asked Mary whether she liked the plan or not.
Tom and Mary sat together three rows behind John.
Tom and Mary seem to be flirting with each other.
Tom and Mary seem to be in the middle of a fight.
Tom and Mary spent all Saturday morning together.
